document_data.caption: A map of Bezantur showing the Sea Wolf Inn (labeled #4).
document_data.name: Sea Wolf Inn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sea Wolf Inn''' was an [[inn]] located in the coastal city of [[Bezantur]] in [[Thay]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|3870 Bezantur}}
document_data.Location: The Sea Wolf Inn was located in southern Bezantur on the waterfront with the [[Alamber Sea]] near the docks.
